name: Pilllllar
description:
Collect cargo in your trusty Drake Caterpillar and become the longest Caterpillar there ever was!

Background looks weird on some Macs, no idea why. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

An entry for Star Citizen's SCShipShowdown

Vote for it here: https://robertsspaceindustries.com/community/citizen-spotlight/25228-Pilllllar
